amendment.description: Amendment sought to require a GAO study to determine school districts most in need of constructing or renovating school-based health centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to require a GAO study to determine school districts most in need of constructing or renovating school-based health centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pallone amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 205 - 210 (Roll no. 288).
